derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English māwan, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch maaien, German mähen 'mow', also to mead

entry.def: If you mow an area of grass, you cut it using a machine called a lawn mower.

means.word_mean: 1. cut with a blade or mower;
2. make a sad face and thrust out one's lower lip;
